subsc:
Health,General water, sanitation and flood

trustfund:
TF026722-PHRD-UGANDA: POVERTY REDUCTION
            SUPPORT CREDIT (PRSC II)

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Poverty Reduction Support
            Credit (PRSC) Project will support the implementation of
            Uganda's poverty reduction strategy as summarized in
            the Poverty Reduction Strategy Paper (PRSP), emphasizing
            enhanced service delivery and agricultural production.
            Uganda's reform program under the Second PRSC will be
            implemented through: a) efficient and equitable use of
            public resources; b) improved governance through
            cross-cutting public sector reforms; c) promotion of
            enabling environment for rural development; and d) improved
            access to and quality of education, health care, and water
            and sanitation services. The reforms supported will
            strengthen the institutional infrastructure needed to
            improve the public sector's capacity to carry out its
            role more effectively, as envisioned in the Poverty
            Eradication Action Plan and the PRSP. Improved delivery of
            public services is essential if the Government is to reach
            its goals for poverty reduction and improve the quality of
            life in Uganda. Risks under the reform program include:
            institutional and human capacity weaknesses, corruption, and
            fiduciary risks.
